properties.displayName: DLL Sideloading by VMware Xfer Utility
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where FolderPath endswith "\\VMwareXferlogs.exe" and (not(FolderPath startswith "C:\\Program Files\\VMware\\"))

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects execution of VMware Xfer utility (VMwareXferlogs.exe) from the non-default directory which may be an attempt to sideload arbitrary DLL
